PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-14642018-11-29,  ,  GAC,  , 
ActJustice for Victims of Corrupt Foreign Officials Act (Sergei Magnitsky Law)
SubjectRegulations Amending the Justice for Victims of Corrupt Foreign Officials Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the JUSTICE FOR VICTIMS OF CORRUPT FOREIGN OFFICIALS REGULATIONS in order to (1) signal Canada's condemnation of the gross violations of internationally-recognized human rights; and (2) seek an end to impunity for these violations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0259 Publication Date: 2018-12-12
AttachmentsAttachment
